summary: A collection of four clean, custom saves.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Times New Roman][size=5]This is a small collection of "hardcore" Skyrim saves:[/size]
[/font]
[size=5]Saves included:[/size]

[font=Comic Sans MS]Aleika the Bandit:[/font] You are bandit at a small camp near a shipwreck, you are[size=4] [/size]a friend to all bandits.

[font=Comic Sans MS]Arakai the Orc:[/font] You are an orc, your father has died during the civil war and left you with nothing but his sword.

[font=Comic Sans MS]Khanji the Beggar:[/font] You are a Khajiit, you were captured by Astrid as part of the Dark Brotherhood initiation, but you managed to escape out into the swamp.

[font=Comic Sans MS]Relkia the Thief:[/font] You where in the middle of picking someones pocket when a guard tried to apprehend you. You killed him and one of his companions, but all the guards of Whiterun were on you in a matter of seconds, you were forced to surrender. Now you are trying to escape Dragonsreach Dungeon.

[size=5]Requirements: [/size]

A legitimate copy of Skyrim with the latest update.

[size=5]Recommended Mods: [/size]

USKP: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19/?

Skyrim HD 2K Textures: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/607/?

SkyUI: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?

Xenius Character Enhancement: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2356/?

Anything by: Hothtrooper

Anything by: T3nd0

Anything by: Arthmoor

[size=5]Installation: [/size]

If not using ModOrganizer: Drop into C:/Users/(Username)/Documents/My Games/Skyrim/Saves

If using Mod Organizer (It's really useful, you should try it): Drop into ..../ModOrganizer/profiles/[profile being used}/saves

ENB Used in 1st pic.: I took the picture a while ago, so I don't remember exactly, but I believe it was one of the Grim and Somber ENBs.
author: MicroWarrior
